name: Apex Legends
description:
The Next Evolution of Battle Royale

Show ‘em what you’re made of in Apex Legends, a free-to-play Battle Royale game where contenders from across the Frontier team up to battle for glory, fame, and fortune.

Explore a growing roster of powerful Legends, each with their own unique personality, strengths, and abilities. Choose your Legend, team up with two other players, and combine your unique skills to be the last squad standing. Master your Legend’s abilities, make strategic calls on the fly, and use your team’s strengths to your advantage.
